nodes.text: The Expeditionary Fleet was a naval unit of Imperial Navy. It was composed of a dozen Harrower-class capital ships and many smaller Terminus-class destroyers. During the Cold War, it was under the command of Darth Malgus and was frequently stationed at Vaiken Spacedock. Two of its prominent operations include the attack on the Dorin's Sky and the Battle of the Foundry which led to defeat of the legendary Jedi Master Revan and capture of an ancient Rakatan droid factory.

This fleet is first mentioned in a prelude to Hammer Station flashpoint and subsequently in other flashpoints introduced to the player by Malgus. This includes the quest chain for "Call to Arms" that involves a mission against The Foundry that is under the command of Revan.
